summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the ImageGPT model's configuration, forward behavior, and support for tasks such as causal language modeling and image classification. It also checks model serialization, pretrained loading, embedding resizing, left‑padding handling, and gradient checkpointing options.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the ImageGPT implementation so that developers can confidently integrate it into image generation, classification, or fine‑tuning pipelines and deploy reliable AI solutions.
